Certaine small poems lately printed with the tragedie of Philotas. Written by Samuel Daniel. Selections Daniel, Samuel, 1562-1619.
[224] p.
Printed by G. Eld for Simon Waterson [and Edward Blount], At London : 1605.
Signatures: A-H; A-F. H8 and the last two leaves are blank; ¹A1,2 are blank except for signature-marks. "The tragedie of Philotas" has separate register and title page with imprint: At London printed by G.E. for Simon Waterson and Edward Blount. 1605. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
